name: A Walk With A Cloud
description:
Eddie isn't having a very good day. It's the day of the Sky Festival, but her wings don't work like everyone else's, so she can't go. And since all her friends are there, she's stuck alone in town. Alone, that is, until she hears someone calling from the tree above her head...

~~~

A Walk With A Cloud is a visual novel with point-and-click elements made for Yuri Jam 2019. Play as Eddie, a young bird person, and join her as she goes on a walk with the cloud girl who suddenly appears in her town.

This game has five endings and should take about 30 minutes to complete. It comes with self-voicing, image and sound captions (Caption Tool courtesy of npckc).

The game is free, but if you pay $3 or more you can support me as a creator and get a digital art book containing all art from the game, sketches, and author's notes, which is also available as a text-only PDF.

Content Warning: This game deals with the struggles of someone with a fantasy disability.  Although the disability is not real, the issues discussed may still feel sensitive and personal.
